alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:58PM CDT until May 06 at 10:58AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Walnut River at Winfield affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. Walnut River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. For the Walnut River...including Augusta, Winfield...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Walnut River at Augusta. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, A narrow strip of about 80 feet on the right bank begins to overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 24.0 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tonight and continue falling to 6.0 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Walnut River Augusta 23.0 24.0 Thu 8 pm CDT 11.4 8.3 6.4 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
